text:
Now I can see the issue! The TypeScript interface definition for `pem.questions` (lines 309-332) doesn't include `activityTolerance`. It only has `frequency`, `mentalFrequency`, `onsetTime`, `severity`, and `recoveryTime`. But the actual translations file has `activityTolerance`, `delayedOnset`, `disproportionate`, `prolongedRecovery`, and `activityTypes`.

I need to update the TypeScript interface to match the actual translation structure:
